channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-16171|2024-09-16T17:37:48.255Z -- hackerone -- hcbserver%20node%20module
item.description: hcbserver is a static file server. hcbserver is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2016-10621|2024-09-16T17:14:52.722Z -- hackerone -- fibjs%20node%20module
item.description: fibjs is a runtime for javascript applictions built on google v8 JS. fibjs downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16132|2024-09-16T17:32:42.217Z -- hackerone -- simple-npm-registry%20node%20module
item.description: simple-npm-registry is a local npm package cache. simple-npm-registry is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2016-10573|2024-09-16T18:34:31.669Z -- hackerone -- baryton-saxophone%20node%20module
item.description: baryton-saxophone is a module to install and launch Selenium Server for Mac, Linux and Windows. baryton-saxophone versions below 3.0.1 download binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-0901|2024-09-16T20:22:06.483Z -- hackerone -- rubygems
item.description: RubyGems version 2.6.12 and earlier fails to validate specification names, allowing a maliciously crafted gem to potentially overwrite any file on the filesystem.

item.title: CVE-2016-10548|2024-09-16T20:03:43.284Z -- hackerone -- reduce-css-calc%20node%20module
item.description: Arbitrary code execution is possible in reduce-css-calc node module <=1.2.4 through crafted css. This makes cross sites scripting (XSS) possible on the client and arbitrary code injection possible on the server and user input is passed to the `calc` function.

item.title: CVE-2017-16190|2024-09-16T17:58:53.973Z -- hackerone -- dcdcdcdcdc%20node%20module
item.description: dcdcdcdcdc is a static file server. dcdcdcdcdc is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2016-10664|2024-09-16T19:24:06.701Z -- hackerone -- mystem%20node%20module
item.description: mystem is a Node.js wrapper for MyStem morphology text analyzer by Yandex.ru mystem downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16105|2024-09-16T19:24:33.590Z -- hackerone -- serverwzl%20node%20module
item.description: serverwzl is a simple http server. serverwzl is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the URL.

item.title: CVE-2017-16226|2024-09-16T16:38:08.513Z -- hackerone -- static-eval%20node%20module%20node%20module
item.description: The static-eval module is intended to evaluate statically-analyzable expressions. In affected versions, untrusted user input is able to access the global function constructor, effectively allowing arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2017-16067|2024-09-16T17:14:25.481Z -- hackerone -- node-opencv%20node%20module
item.description: node-opencv was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.title: CVE-2018-3731|2024-09-16T17:23:52.400Z -- hackerone -- public%20node%20module
item.description: public node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of filePath, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2017-16107|2024-09-16T18:13:41.674Z -- hackerone -- pooledwebsocket%20node%20module
item.description: pooledwebsocket is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16053|2024-09-16T17:14:00.858Z -- hackerone -- fabric-js%20node%20module
item.description: `fabric-js` was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.title: CVE-2016-10555|2024-09-16T16:38:09.923Z -- hackerone -- jwt-simple%20node%20module
item.description: Since "algorithm" isn't enforced in jwt.decode()in jwt-simple 0.3.0 and earlier, a malicious user could choose what algorithm is sent sent to the server. If the server is expecting RSA but is sent HMAC-SHA with RSA's public key, the server will think the public key is actually an HMAC private key. This could be used to forge any data an attacker wants.

item.title: CVE-2016-10524|2024-09-16T17:27:42.388Z -- hackerone -- i18n-node-angular%20node%20module
item.description: i18n-node-angular is a module used to interact between i18n and angular without using additional resources. A REST API endpoint that is used for development in i18n-node-angular before 1.4.0 was not disabled in production environments a malicious user could fill up the server causing a Denial of Service or content injection.

item.title: CVE-2016-10587|2024-09-16T17:13:54.056Z -- hackerone -- wasdk%20node%20module
item.description: wasdk is a toolkit for creating WebAssembly modules. wasdk downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16073|2024-09-16T18:23:43.644Z -- hackerone -- noderequest%20node%20module
item.description: noderequest was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.title: CVE-2016-10654|2024-09-16T16:13:24.860Z -- hackerone -- sfml%20node%20module
item.description: sfml downloads resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks.

item.title: CVE-2017-16079|2024-09-16T17:15:27.449Z -- hackerone -- smb%20node%20module
item.description: smb was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.title: CVE-2017-16154|2024-09-16T17:17:58.169Z -- hackerone -- earlybird%20node%20module
item.description: earlybird is a web server module for early development. earlybird is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16224|2024-09-16T20:47:48.660Z -- hackerone -- st%20node%20module
item.description: st is a module for serving static files. An attacker is able to craft a request that results in an HTTP 301 (redirect) to an entirely different domain. A request for: http://some.server.com//nodesecurity.org/%2e%2e would result in a 301 to //nodesecurity.org/%2e%2e which most browsers treat as a proper redirect as // is translated into the current schema being used. Mitigating factor: In order for this to work, st must be serving from the root of a server (/) rather than the typical sub directory (/static/) and the redirect URL will end with some form of URL encoded .. ("%2e%2e", "%2e.", ".%2e").

item.title: CVE-2017-16080|2024-09-16T17:59:03.922Z -- hackerone -- nodesass%20node%20module
item.description: nodesass was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.title: CVE-2016-10613|2024-09-16T18:29:00.314Z -- hackerone -- bionode-sra%20node%20module
item.description: bionode-sra is a Node.js wrapper for SRA Toolkit. bionode-sra downloads data resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks.

item.title: CVE-2016-10579|2024-09-16T17:58:08.508Z -- hackerone -- chromedriver%20node%20module
item.description: Chromedriver is an NPM wrapper for selenium ChromeDriver. Chromedriver before 2.26.1 downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16108|2024-09-16T18:08:21.402Z -- hackerone -- gaoxiaotingtingting%20node%20module
item.description: gaoxiaotingtingting is an HTTP server. gaoxiaotingtingting is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16083|2024-09-16T18:13:51.663Z -- hackerone -- node-simple-router%20node%20module
item.description: node-simple-router is a minimalistic router for Node. node-simple-router is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the URL.

item.title: CVE-2016-10659|2024-09-16T17:08:05.600Z -- hackerone -- poco%20node%20module
item.description: poco - The POCO libraries, downloads source file resources used for compilation over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested resources with an attacker controlled copy if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2018-3724|2024-09-16T19:15:34.641Z -- hackerone -- general-file-server%20node%20module
item.description: general-file-server node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of currpath, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2017-16174|2024-09-16T20:58:02.930Z -- hackerone -- whispercast%20node%20module
item.description: whispercast is a file server. whispercast is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2016-10615|2024-09-16T16:38:19.695Z -- hackerone -- curses%20node%20module
item.description: curses is bindings for the native curses library, a full featured console IO library. curses downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2016-10570|2024-09-16T18:43:52.168Z -- hackerone -- pngcrush-installer%20node%20module
item.description: pngcrush-installer is an installer for Pngcrush. pngcrush-installer versions below 1.8.10 download binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2016-10650|2024-09-16T17:08:14.161Z -- hackerone -- ntfserver%20node%20module
item.description: ntfserver is a Network Testing Framework Server. ntfserver downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16022|2024-09-16T21:08:55.440Z -- hackerone -- morris.js%20node%20module
item.description: Morris.js creates an svg graph, with labels that appear when hovering over a point. The hovering label names are not escaped in versions 0.5.0 and earlier. If control over the labels is obtained, script can be injected. The script will run on the client side whenever that specific graph is loaded.

item.title: CVE-2018-3723|2024-09-16T21:08:12.039Z -- hackerone -- defaults-deep%20node%20module
item.description: defaults-deep node module before 0.2.4 suffers from a Modification of Assumed-Immutable Data (MAID) vulnerability, which allows a malicious user to modify the prototype of "Object" via __proto__, causing the addition or modification of an existing property that will exist on all objects.

item.title: CVE-2017-16203|2024-09-16T19:00:54.469Z -- hackerone -- coffeescript%20node%20module
item.description: The coffe-script module exfiltrates sensitive data such as a user's private SSH key and bash history to a third party server during installation.

item.title: CVE-2016-10632|2024-09-16T20:11:24.802Z -- hackerone -- apk-parser2%20node%20module
item.description: apk-parser2 is a module which extracts Android Manifest info from an APK file. apk-parser2 downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16151|2024-09-16T16:54:03.710Z -- hackerone -- electron%20node%20module
item.description: Based on details posted by the ElectronJS team; A remote code execution vulnerability has been discovered in Google Chromium that affects all recent versions of Electron. Any Electron app that accesses remote content is vulnerable to this exploit, regardless of whether the [sandbox option](https://electron.atom.io/docs/api/sandbox-option) is enabled.

item.title: CVE-2017-16137|2024-09-16T19:00:36.638Z -- hackerone -- debug%20node%20module
item.description: The debug module is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service when untrusted user input is passed into the o formatter. It takes around 50k characters to block for 2 seconds making this a low severity issue.

item.description: js-given is a JavaScript frontend to jgiven. js-given downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.description: unicorn-list is a web framework. unicorn-list is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.description: hekto node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of file, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested resources with an attacker controlled copy if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2018-3717|2024-09-16T16:52:59.797Z -- hackerone -- connect%20node%20module
item.description: connect node module before 2.14.0 suffers from a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability due to a lack of validation of file in directory.js middleware.

item.description: open-device creates a web interface for any device. open-device is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.description: 11xiaoli is a simple file server. 11xiaoli is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16143|2024-09-16T18:13:46.115Z -- hackerone -- commentapp.stetsonwood%20node%20module
item.description: commentapp.stetsonwood is an http server. commentapp.stetsonwood is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2016-10529|2024-09-16T18:33:59.616Z -- hackerone -- droppy%20node%20module
item.description: Droppy versions <3.5.0 does not perform any verification for cross-domain websocket requests. An attacker is able to make a specially crafted page that can send requests as the context of the currently logged in user. For example this means the malicious user could add a new admin account under his control and delete others.

item.title: CVE-2018-3729|2024-09-16T18:45:17.550Z -- hackerone -- localhost-now%20node%20module
item.description: localhost-now node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of file, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.

item.title: CVE-2016-10559|2024-09-16T17:18:02.860Z -- hackerone -- selenium-download%20node%20module
item.description: selenium-download downloads the latest versions of the selenium standalone server and the chromedriver. selenium-download before 2.0.7 downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2016-10526|2024-09-16T20:37:56.998Z -- hackerone -- grunt-gh-pages%20node%20module
item.description: A common setup to deploy to gh-pages on every commit via a CI system is to expose a github token to ENV and to use it directly in the auth part of the url. In module versions < 0.9.1 the auth portion of the url is outputted as part of the grunt tasks logging function. If this output is publicly available then the credentials should be considered compromised.

item.description: mfrs is a static file server. mfrs is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.description: Prince is a Node API for executing XML/HTML to PDF renderer PrinceXML via prince(1) CLI. prince downloads zipped resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested tarball with an attacker controlled tarball if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.description: fsk-server is a simple http server. fsk-server is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.description: serve node module suffers from Improper Handling of URL Encoding by permitting access to ignored files if a filename is URL encoded.

item.description: arrayfire-js is a module for ArrayFire for the Node.js platform. arrayfire-js downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2018-3787|2024-09-16T18:03:37.666Z -- hackerone -- simplehttpserver
item.description: Path traversal in simplehttpserver <v0.2.1 allows listing any file on the server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16164|2024-09-16T16:33:48.270Z -- hackerone -- desafio%20node%20module
item.description: desafio is a simple web server. desafio is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url, but is limited to accessing only .html files.

item.title: CVE-2017-16225|2024-09-16T16:52:51.508Z -- hackerone -- aegir%20node%20module
item.description: aegir is a module to help automate JavaScript project management. Version 12.0.0 through and including 12.0.7 bundled and published to npm the user (that performed a aegir-release) GitHub token.

item.title: CVE-2017-16089|2024-09-16T17:02:39.089Z -- hackerone -- serverlyr%20node%20module
item.description: serverlyr is a simple http server. serverlyr is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the URL.

item.title: CVE-2016-10693|2024-09-16T17:48:00.321Z -- hackerone -- pm2-kafka%20node%20module
item.description: pm2-kafka is a PM2 module that installs and runs a kafka server pm2-kafka downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested resources with an attacker controlled copy if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2015-9241|2024-09-16T17:03:05.145Z -- hackerone -- hapi%20node%20module
item.description: Certain input passed into the If-Modified-Since or Last-Modified headers will cause an 'illegal access' exception to be raised. Instead of sending a HTTP 500 error back to the sender, hapi node module before 11.1.3 will continue to hold the socket open until timed out (default node timeout is 2 minutes).

item.title: CVE-2017-16161|2024-09-16T16:12:32.663Z -- hackerone -- shenliru%20node%20module
item.description: shenliru is a simple file server. shenliru is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16031|2024-09-16T21:07:25.207Z -- hackerone -- socket.io%20node%20module
item.description: Socket.io is a realtime application framework that provides communication via websockets. Because socket.io 0.9.6 and earlier depends on `Math.random()` to create socket IDs, the IDs are predictable. An attacker is able to guess the socket ID and gain access to socket.io servers, potentially obtaining sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2017-16219|2024-09-16T18:07:55.684Z -- hackerone -- yttivy%20node%20module
item.description: yttivy is a static file server. yttivy is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16113|2024-09-16T20:46:50.284Z -- hackerone -- parsejson%20node%20module
item.description: The parsejson module is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service when untrusted user input is passed into it to be parsed.

item.title: CVE-2018-3759|2024-09-16T20:26:38.707Z -- hackerone -- private_address_check%20ruby%20gem
item.description: private_address_check ruby gem before 0.5.0 is vulnerable to a time-of-check time-of-use (TOCTOU) race condition due to the address the socket uses not being checked. DNS entries with a TTL of 0 can trigger this case where the initial resolution is a public address but the subsequent resolution is a private address.

item.title: CVE-2017-16167|2024-09-16T16:33:43.884Z -- hackerone -- yyooopack%20node%20module
item.description: yyooopack is a simple file server. yyooopack is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16081|2024-09-16T16:33:41.611Z -- hackerone -- cross-env.js%20node%20module
item.description: cross-env.js was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.title: CVE-2016-10546|2024-09-16T17:07:44.297Z -- hackerone -- pouchdb%20node%20module
item.description: An arbitrary code injection vector was found in PouchDB 6.0.4 and lesser via the map/reduce functions used in PouchDB temporary views and design documents. The code execution engine for this branch is not properly sandboxed and may be used to run arbitrary JavaScript as well as system commands.

item.title: CVE-2017-16182|2024-09-16T16:58:36.683Z -- hackerone -- serverxxx%20node%20module
item.description: serverxxx is a static file server. serverxxx is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16045|2024-09-16T18:28:45.804Z -- hackerone -- jquery.js%20node%20module
item.description: `jquery.js` was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.title: CVE-2017-16116|2024-09-16T19:35:06.187Z -- hackerone -- string%20node%20module
item.description: The string module is a module that provides extra string operations. The string module is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service when specifically crafted untrusted user input is passed into the underscore or unescapeHTML methods.

item.title: CVE-2016-10627|2024-09-16T17:08:31.215Z -- hackerone -- scala-bin%20node%20module
item.description: scala-bin is a binary wrapper for Scala. scala-bin downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16094|2024-09-16T18:49:13.137Z -- hackerone -- iter-http%20node%20module
item.description: iter-http is a server for static files. iter-http is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16092|2024-09-16T17:29:05.227Z -- hackerone -- sencisho%20node%20module
item.description: Sencisho is a simple http server for local development. Sencisho is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the URL.

item.title: CVE-2016-10581|2024-09-16T18:33:59.022Z -- hackerone -- steroids%20node%20module
item.description: Steroids is PhoneGap on Steroids, providing native UI elements, multiple WebViews and enhancements for better developer productivity. steroids downloads zipped resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested tarball with an attacker controlled tarball if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16075|2024-09-16T20:51:39.905Z -- hackerone -- http-proxy.js%20node%20module
item.description: http-proxy.js was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.title: CVE-2017-16204|2024-09-16T17:08:16.634Z -- hackerone -- jquey%20node%20module
item.description: The jquey module exfiltrates sensitive data such as a user's private SSH key and bash history to a third party server during installation.

item.title: CVE-2015-9244|2024-09-16T16:48:28.663Z -- hackerone -- mysql%20node%20module
item.description: Keys of objects in mysql node module v2.0.0-alpha7 and earlier are not escaped with `mysql.escape()` which could lead to SQL Injection.

item.title: CVE-2018-3735|2024-09-16T19:14:25.981Z -- hackerone -- bracket-template%20node%20module
item.description: bracket-template suffers from reflected XSS possible when variable passed via GET parameter is used in template

item.title: CVE-2015-9239|2024-09-16T19:36:41.294Z -- hackerone -- ansi2html%20node%20module
item.description: ansi2html is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service (ReDoS) when certain types of user input is passed in.

item.title: CVE-2016-10634|2024-09-16T17:38:05.451Z -- hackerone -- scalajs-standalone-bin%20node%20module
item.description: scala-standalone-bin is a Binary wrapper for ScalaJS. scala-standalone-bin downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2018-3770|2024-09-16T16:42:35.385Z -- hackerone -- markdown-pdf
item.description: A path traversal exists in markdown-pdf version <9.0.0 that allows a user to insert a malicious html code that can result in reading the local files.

item.title: CVE-2016-10669|2024-09-16T20:27:38.497Z -- hackerone -- soci%20node%20module
item.description: soci downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested resources with an attacker controlled copy if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2016-10530|2024-09-16T17:48:45.037Z -- hackerone -- airbrake%20node%20module
item.description: The airbrake module 0.3.8 and earlier defaults to sending environment variables over HTTP. Environment variables can often times contain secret keys and other sensitive values. A malicious user could be on the same network as a regular user and intercept all the secret keys the user is sending. This goes against common best practice, which is to use HTTPS.

item.title: CVE-2017-16008|2024-09-16T17:53:16.453Z -- hackerone -- i18next%20node%20module
item.description: i18next is a language translation framework. Because of how the interpolation is implemented, making replacements from the dictionary one at a time, untrusted user input can use the name of one of the dictionary keys to inject script into the browser. This affects i18next <=1.10.2.

item.title: CVE-2017-16026|2024-09-16T17:28:08.484Z -- hackerone -- request%20node%20module
item.description: Request is an http client. If a request is made using ```multipart```, and the body type is a ```number```, then the specified number of non-zero memory is passed in the body. This affects Request >=2.2.6 <2.47.0 || >2.51.0 <=2.67.0.

item.title: CVE-2016-10679|2024-09-16T17:52:46.278Z -- hackerone -- selenium-standalone-painful%20node%20module
item.description: selenium-standalone-painful installs a start-selenium command line to start a standalone selenium server with chrome-driver. selenium-standalone-painful downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested resources with an attacker controlled copy if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16147|2024-09-16T17:03:17.308Z -- hackerone -- shit-server%20node%20module
item.description: shit-server is a file server. shit-server is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16005|2024-09-16T19:19:33.991Z -- hackerone -- http-signature%20node%20module
item.description: Http-signature is a "Reference implementation of Joyent's HTTP Signature Scheme". In versions <=0.9.11, http-signature signs only the header values, but not the header names. This makes http-signature vulnerable to header forgery. Thus, if an attacker can intercept a request, he can swap header names and change the meaning of the request without changing the signature.

item.title: CVE-2016-10577|2024-09-16T20:31:37.904Z -- hackerone -- ibm_db%20node%20module
item.description: ibm_db is an asynchronous/synchronous interface for node.js to IBM DB2 and IBM Informix. ibm_db before 1.0.2 downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2018-3778|2024-09-16T18:18:21.081Z -- hackerone -- aedes
item.description: Improper authorization in aedes version <0.35.0 will publish a LWT in a channel when a client is not authorized.

item.title: CVE-2017-0909|2024-09-16T16:49:03.138Z -- hackerone -- private_address_check%20ruby%20gem
item.description: The private_address_check ruby gem before 0.4.1 is vulnerable to a bypass due to an incomplete blacklist of common private/local network addresses used to prevent server-side request forgery.

item.title: CVE-2017-0938|2024-09-16T18:49:35.479Z -- hackerone -- airmax%2C%20edgemax
item.description: Denial of Service attack in airMAX < 8.3.2 , airMAX < 6.0.7 and EdgeMAX < 1.9.7 allow attackers to use the Discovery Protocol in amplification attacks.

item.title: CVE-2017-16020|2024-09-16T20:06:20.093Z -- hackerone -- summit%20node%20module
item.description: Summit is a node web framework. When using the PouchDB driver in the module, Summit 0.1.0 and later allows an attacker to execute arbitrary commands via the collection name.

item.title: CVE-2017-16043|2024-09-16T16:58:10.449Z -- hackerone -- shout%20node%20module
item.description: Shout is an IRC client. Because the `/topic` command in messages is unescaped, attackers have the ability to inject HTML scripts that will run in the victim's browser. Affects shout >=0.44.0 <=0.49.3.

item.title: CVE-2016-10547|2024-09-16T16:43:50.537Z -- hackerone -- nunjucks%20node%20module
item.description: Nunjucks is a full featured templating engine for JavaScript. Versions 2.4.2 and lower have a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in autoescape mode. In autoescape mode, all template vars should automatically be escaped. By using an array for the keys, such as `name[]=<script>alert(1)</script>`, it is possible to bypass autoescaping and inject content into the DOM.

item.title: CVE-2017-16188|2024-09-16T17:43:50.911Z -- hackerone -- reecerver%20node%20module
item.description: reecerver is a web server. reecerver is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16084|2024-09-16T17:33:15.728Z -- hackerone -- list-n-stream%20node%20module
item.description: list-n-stream is a server for static files to list and stream local videos. list-n-stream v0.0.10 or lower is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16098|2024-09-16T18:03:05.636Z -- hackerone -- charset%20node%20module
item.description: charset 1.0.0 and below are vulnerable to regular expression denial of service. Input of around 50k characters is required for a slow down of around 2 seconds. Unless node was compiled using the -DHTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE= option the default header max length is 80kb, so the impact of the ReDoS is relatively low.

item.title: CVE-2016-10691|2024-09-16T21:56:59.682Z -- hackerone -- windows-seleniumjar%20node%20module
item.description: windows-seleniumjar is a module that downloads the Selenium Jar file windows-seleniumjar downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested resources with an attacker controlled copy if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16129|2024-09-16T19:04:07.190Z -- hackerone -- superagent%20node%20module
item.description: The HTTP client module superagent is vulnerable to ZIP bomb attacks. In a ZIP bomb attack, the HTTP server replies with a compressed response that becomes several magnitudes larger once uncompressed. If a client does not take special care when processing such responses, it may result in excessive CPU and/or memory consumption. An attacker might exploit such a weakness for a DoS attack. To exploit this the attacker must control the location (URL) that superagent makes a request to.

item.title: CVE-2016-10568|2024-09-16T19:35:14.748Z -- hackerone -- geoip-lite-country%20node%20module
item.description: geoip-lite-country is a stripped down version of geoip-lite, supporting only country lookup. geoip-lite-country before 1.1.4 downloads data resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks.

item.title: CVE-2016-10551|2024-09-16T16:58:50.345Z -- hackerone -- waterline-sequel%20node%20module
item.description: waterline-sequel is a module that helps generate SQL statements for Waterline apps Any user input that goes into Waterline's `like`, `contains`, `startsWith`, or `endsWith` will end up in waterline-sequel with the potential for malicious code. A malicious user can input their own SQL statements in waterline-sequel 0.50 that will get executed and have full access to the database.

item.title: CVE-2017-16062|2024-09-16T17:18:57.339Z -- hackerone -- node-tkinter%20node%20module
item.description: node-tkinter was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.title: CVE-2016-10661|2024-09-16T16:24:14.031Z -- hackerone -- phantomjs-cheniu%20node%20module
item.description: phantomjs-cheniu is a Headless WebKit with JS API phantomjs-cheniu downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested resources with an attacker controlled copy if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2016-10599|2024-09-16T17:08:40.165Z -- hackerone -- sauce-connect%20node%20module
item.description: sauce-connect is a Node.js wrapper over the SauceLabs SauceConnect.jar program for establishing a secure tunnel for intranet testing. sauce-connect downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16111|2024-09-16T20:37:31.202Z -- hackerone -- content%20node%20module
item.description: The content module is a module to parse HTTP Content-* headers. It is used by the hapijs framework to provide this functionality. The module is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service when passed a specifically crafted Content-Type or Content-Disposition header.

item.title: CVE-2017-16138|2024-09-16T19:01:13.031Z -- hackerone -- mime%20node%20module
item.description: The mime module < 1.4.1, 2.0.1, 2.0.2 is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service when a mime lookup is performed on untrusted user input.

item.title: CVE-2016-10655|2024-09-16T20:47:53.082Z -- hackerone -- clang-extra%20node%20module
item.description: The clang-extra module installs LLVM's clang-extra tools. clang-extra downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested resources with an attacker controlled copy if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2016-10563|2024-09-16T18:49:48.687Z -- hackerone -- go-ipfs-dep%20node%20module
item.description: During the installation process, the go-ipfs-deps module before 0.4.4 insecurely downloads resources over HTTP. This allows for a MITM attack to compromise the integrity of the resources used by this module and could allow for further compromise.

item.title: CVE-2017-16007|2024-09-16T18:23:49.490Z -- hackerone -- node-jose%20node%20module
item.description: node-jose is a JavaScript implementation of the JSON Object Signing and Encryption (JOSE) for current web browsers and node.js-based servers. node-jose earlier than version 0.9.3 is vulnerable to an invalid curve attack. This allows an attacker to recover the private secret key when JWE with Key Agreement with Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman Ephemeral Static (ECDH-ES) is used.

item.title: CVE-2016-10540|2024-09-16T19:24:48.196Z -- hackerone -- minimatch%20node%20module
item.description: Minimatch is a minimal matching utility that works by converting glob expressions into JavaScript `RegExp` objects. The primary function, `minimatch(path, pattern)` in Minimatch 3.0.1 and earlier is vulnerable to ReDoS in the `pattern` parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-3771|2024-09-16T17:03:15.839Z -- hackerone -- statics-server
item.description: An XSS in statics-server <= 0.0.9 can be used via injected iframe in the filename when statics-server displays directory index in the browser.

item.title: CVE-2017-16042|2024-09-16T17:08:21.801Z -- hackerone -- growl%20node%20module
item.description: Growl adds growl notification support to nodejs. Growl before 1.10.2 does not properly sanitize input before passing it to exec, allowing for arbitrary command execution.

item.title: CVE-2016-10567|2024-09-16T17:48:59.372Z -- hackerone -- product-monitor%20node%20module
item.description: product-monitor is a HTML/JavaScript template for monitoring a product by encouraging product developers to gather all the information about the status of a product, including live monitoring, statistics, endpoints, and test results into one place. product-monitor versions below 2.2.5 download JavaScript resources over HTTP, which leaves the module vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested JavaScript file with an attacker controlled JavaScript file if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2016-10635|2024-09-16T19:09:07.141Z -- hackerone -- broccoli-closure%20node%20module

item.description: tencent-server is a simple web server. tencent-server is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16024|2024-09-16T17:48:58.293Z -- hackerone -- sync-exec%20node%20module
item.description: The sync-exec module is used to simulate child_process.execSync in node versions <0.11.9. Sync-exec uses tmp directories as a buffer before returning values. Other users on the server have read access to the tmp directory, possibly allowing an attacker on the server to obtain confidential information from the buffer/tmp file, while it exists.

It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2016-10574|2024-09-16T16:58:41.863Z -- hackerone -- apk-parser3%20node%20module
item.description: apk-parser3 is a module to extract Android Manifest info from an APK file. apk-parser3 versions before 0.1.3 download binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2018-3760|2024-09-16T18:39:20.968Z -- hackerone -- sprockets
item.description: There is an information leak vulnerability in Sprockets. Versions Affected: 4.0.0.beta7 and lower, 3.7.1 and lower, 2.12.4 and lower. Specially crafted requests can be used to access files that exists on the filesystem that is outside an application's root directory, when the Sprockets server is used in production. All users running an affected release should either upgrade or use one of the work arounds immediately.

item.title: CVE-2017-16072|2024-09-16T17:48:12.721Z -- hackerone -- nodemailer.js%20node%20module
item.description: nodemailer.js was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.title: CVE-2017-16088|2024-09-16T16:13:38.445Z -- hackerone -- safe-eval%20node%20module
item.description: The safe-eval module describes itself as a safer version of eval. By accessing the object constructors, un-sanitized user input can access the entire standard library and effectively break out of the sandbox.

item.title: CVE-2017-16195|2024-09-16T20:06:51.516Z -- hackerone -- pytservce%20node%20module
item.description: pytservce is a static file server. pytservce is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16061|2024-09-16T19:01:00.831Z -- hackerone -- tkinter%20node%20module
item.description: tkinter was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.title: CVE-2016-10609|2024-09-16T16:43:23.996Z -- hackerone -- chromedriver126%20node%20module
item.description: chromedriver126 is chromedriver version 1.26 for linux OS. chromedriver126 downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested binary with an attacker controlled binary if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2016-10677|2024-09-16T21:08:30.402Z -- hackerone -- google-closure-tools-latest%20node%20module
item.description: google-closure-tools-latest is a Node.js module wrapper for downloading the latest version of the Google Closure tools google-closure-tools-latest downloads binary resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested resources with an attacker controlled copy if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16085|2024-09-16T19:46:49.324Z -- hackerone -- tinyserver2%20node%20module
item.description: tinyserver2 is a webserver for static files. tinyserver2 is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the URL.

item.title: CVE-2014-10066|2024-09-16T16:48:22.004Z -- hackerone -- fancy-server%20node%20module
item.description: Versions less than 0.1.4 of the static file server module fancy-server are vulnerable to directory traversal. An attacker can provide input such as `../` to read files outside of the served directory.

item.title: CVE-2016-10521|2024-09-16T19:50:46.651Z -- hackerone -- jshamcrest%20node%20module
item.description: jshamcrest is vulnerable to regular expression denial of service (ReDoS) when certain types of user input is passed in to the emailAddress validator.

item.title: CVE-2016-10611|2024-09-16T20:26:34.568Z -- hackerone -- strider-sauce%20node%20module
item.description: strider-sauce is Sauce Labs / Selenium support for Strider. strider-sauce downloads zipped resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested zip file with an attacker controlled zip file if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16058|2024-09-16T19:14:31.734Z -- hackerone -- gruntcli%20node%20module
item.description: gruntcli was a malicious module published with the intent to hijack environment variables. It has been unpublished by npm.

item.description: myserver.alexcthomas18 is a file server. myserver.alexcthomas18 is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16091|2024-09-16T21:02:25.201Z -- hackerone -- xtalk%20node%20module
item.description: xtalk helps your browser talk to nodex, a simple web framework. xtalk is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the URL.

item.title: CVE-2016-10569|2024-09-16T17:39:03.270Z -- hackerone -- embedza%20node%20module
item.description: embedza is a module to create HTML snippets/embeds from URLs using info from oEmbed, Open Graph, meta tags. embedza versions below 1.2.4 download JavaScript resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested JavaScript file with an attacker controlled JavaScript file if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16146|2024-09-16T20:17:51.868Z -- hackerone -- mockserve%20node%20module
item.description: mockserve is a file server. mockserve is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16018|2024-09-16T17:54:46.223Z -- hackerone -- restify%20node%20module
item.description: Restify is a framework for building REST APIs. Restify >=2.0.0 <=4.0.4 using URL encoded script tags in a non-existent URL, an attacker can get script to run in some browsers.

item.description: scott-blanch-weather-app is a sample Node.js app using Express 4. scott-blanch-weather-app is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.description: lab6drewfusbyu is an http server. lab6drewfusbyu is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.description: gfe-sass is a library for promises (CommonJS/Promises/A,B,D) gfe-sass downloads resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested resources with an attacker controlled copy if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2017-16010|2024-09-16T18:38:55.446Z -- hackerone -- i18next%20node%20module
item.description: i18next is a language translation framework. When using the .init method, passing interpolation options without passing an escapeValue will default to undefined rather than the assumed true. This can result in a cross-site scripting vulnerability because user input is assumed to be escaped, but is not. This vulnerability affects i18next 2.0.0 and later.

item.title: CVE-2016-10618|2024-09-16T18:18:18.244Z -- hackerone -- node-browser%20node%20module
item.description: node-browser is a wrapper webdriver by nodejs. node-browser downloads resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks.

item.description: myprolyz is a static file server. myprolyz is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.

item.title: CVE-2017-16014|2024-09-16T21:57:09.433Z -- hackerone -- http-proxy%20node%20module
item.description: Http-proxy is a proxying library. Because of the way errors are handled in versions before 0.7.0, an attacker that forces an error can crash the server, causing a denial of service.
